price: 208. En nooit hebben Wij een stad vernietigd zonder dat er waarschuwers waren –
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
